ValidationRule.description: GBE and Key Code are required fields for non-D&S approvers.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), ISPICKVAL( SBU__c , "ATR")||ISPICKVAL( SBU__c , "BGA"), OR( ISBLANK(text( GBE__c )), ISBLANK(Key_Code__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: GBE and Key Code are required fields for this record.
